examples: waited around for the next flight

definitions.text: by a circular or circuitous route
examples: He came all the way around the base
the road goes around the pond

definitions.text: used of movement to or among many different places or in no particular direction
examples: wandering about with no place to go
he needs advice from someone who's been around

definitions.text: in a circle or circular motion
(of quantities) imprecise but fairly close to correct
examples: I've had about all I can stand
we meet about once a month
20 or so people were at the party

definitions.text: in or to a reversed position or direction
to a particular destination either specified or understood
examples: she came around to see me
I invited them around for supper

definitions.text: all around or on all sides
examples: There were trees growing all around
the trunk is ten feet around
the pond is two miles around
It rains all year round on Skye
